body:
hi 

i don't know how to explain my error situation....so i want to show the EP result surface by surface but i've this error than i don't know where it come from!! I put all the error into a red group.....thanks for any help

replies.body: LHOR, I can't get to the bottom of it right now but, using the "Label Zone Surfaces" component, it looks like the problem is related to this "Core_Piano" surface that you have jutting out into the middle of one of your zones: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Wui*gYiAaOpTJSuTvWZTtYWr0jsdnhxUoMPyzAhHVfjU9x6NuUVNKsv*2gSEVMB8hi5K-b3xXPRNjIdqUbNB9V4pMjQ-eDGo/CorePiano.JPG) Try removing it and see if that fixes the problem. -Chris
Hi chris your advice not fixes the error,is it in the geometry or something else???
